title: The Other Einstein
description:
At a time when women were not allowed into universities, Mileva Marić Einstein was a rare and gifted scientific mind in 19th century Europe. But as her husband Albert went on to define modern physics, she was missing from the story. But now unearthed letters raise the question: Was Mileva the Mother of the Atomic Age?

Order Marie’s novel about Mileva Marić Einstein, The Other Einstein, from Amazon, Barnes & Noble, or an independent bookstore near you
